name: Dream Mirror Dreamrecalling
text: If a "Dream Mirror" monster you control is Tributed to activate its own effect, shuffle it into the Deck instead of sending it to the GY. During the Main Phase: You can send this face-up card to the GY; place face-up in your Field Zone, 1 of your "Dream Mirror of Joy" or "Dream Mirror of Terror" that is banished or in your GY, then you can Special Summon 1 monster from your hand that specifically lists the placed card in its text.
